pageProduct.name: OGX Coconut Milk Shampoo 385ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Hair has a life of it's own and OGX wants to make sure it's a full life. Each innovative salon quality formula is made with on-trend ingredients to help hair shine, move, curl up, hold tight - whatever sets its personality free. The collections are fun and the choices never end.

In the world of haircare, no other brand has hair looking, smelling, and feeling like this. OGX is WHAT HAIR WANTS

General Information

OGX Coconut Milk Shampoo helps add strength, elasticity, hydration, and balance for healthy hair. The sulfate free shampoo uses a luxurious hydrating blend of coconut milk, coconut oil and egg white proteins to soften and moisturise the hair.

OGX Nourishing+ Coconut Milk Shampoo
Why You Want It... It's like a trip to the tropics in a bottle. The luxuriously creamy, hydrating shampoo blend helps leave your hair feeling moisturized, glowing, and super soft.

Indulge your senses with this exclusive blend with coconut milk, coconut oil, and ultra whipped egg white proteins. This exotic coconut shampoo formula helps add strength, elasticity, hydration, and balance for healthy hair.


  • Moisturising shampoo with coconut milk, coconut oil and egg white proteins

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: refer to exsiting AW

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Coconut Milk
• Nourishing Shampoo
• Adds Strength, Elasticity, Hydration & Balance
